articles.title: „Der Warnstreik der EVG ist eine Schmierenkomödie, ein abgekartetes Spiel“
articles.image_title: A worker walks past a locomotive on train tracks of German railway operator Deutsche Bahn at the railway freight station in Hagen, western Germany, on March 24, 2023. - Transport across much of Germany will be paralysed on Monday, March 27, 2023, as workers strike demanding higher wages to cope with surging inflation, the latest industrial action in Europe's top economy. Staff at airports, ports, the railways, buses and subways will walk out across large parts of the country, the Verdi and EVG unions announced. (Photo by INA FASSBENDER / AFP)
